definition: to do sth more quickly/Hurry up!/Get a move on!

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
erhua variant of 快點|快点[kuai4 dian3]

sentences.english: Come on. Say it, you ninny .
Mothers-in-law hasten sons-in-law to buy houses, thus they may assure before their daughters getting married.
sentences.chinese: 丈母孃督促小女婿快點買房，這樣才放心嫁女兒。

sentences.english: Hurry up, or you won't keep up with them.
sentences.chinese: 快點，否則你就趕不上他們了。

sentences.english: Getup . You're going to that party and you'll have to hurry.
sentences.chinese: 起來，你要去參加晚會，而且你要快點。

sentences.english: Come on, Wang Lin. We'll be late for the concert.
sentences.chinese: 王林，快點吧，我們去音樂會要遲到了。

sentences.english: Could you please drive faster? I'm in a hurry.
sentences.chinese: 您能開快點兒嗎？我趕時間。

sentences.english: The Mart I'm referring to for a quick oil change.
sentences.chinese: 我開車到超級一流世界，圖的是換油快點。

sentences.english: No. 10 ☆T-bag: How about getting us to somewhere cooler, say, Africa?
sentences.chinese: 把我們丟到涼快點的地方往怎麼樣，比如，非洲？

sentences.english: Can we get there in time.If we hurry?
sentences.chinese: 快點的話我們還能按時趕到嗎？

sentences.english: Come on! Are you a man or an amoeba?
sentences.chinese: 安德森先生，快點你是個人或阿米巴變形蟲？

sentences.english: Jim, come along. I'm in a hurry.
sentences.chinese: 噢，吉姆，快點，我急着要走呀。

sentences.english: We're starving, and would you mind hurrying?
sentences.chinese: 我們都要餓死了，能快點兒嗎？

sentences.english: Would you please let the fluid drop more quickly?
sentences.chinese: 請您把液體滴速調快點兒好嗎？

sentences.english: He switched his horse to make it go faster .
sentences.chinese: 他鞭打馬，讓他走的快點。

sentences.english: Mortimer, be quick, be clear, or I swear I'll disinherit you.
sentences.chinese: 莫蒂默，快點給我解釋清楚，不然有你好看的。

definition: at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
(final particle equivalent to 了[le5])/(particle calling attention to, or mildly warning of, a situation)
to say again/to put off a discussion until later/moreover/what's more/besides
we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
to overtake/to catch up with/to hurry/to rush/to try to catch (the bus etc)/to drive (cattle etc) forward/to drive (sb) away/to avail oneself of (an opportunity)/until
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
